tool_description: An API to retrieve climate change information from the top newspapers across the world and especially focusing on India.
name: Climate Change Live News and Updates
title: Climate Change Live News and Updates
tool_name: Climate Change Live News and Updates

api_list.name: Get Specific Source Based Climate Change News and Updates
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the climate change news and updates from a specific newspaper/ source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-news-and-updates.p.rapidapi.com/news/gaurdian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-news-and-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News and Updates
api_list.description: This endpoint will return climate change information - news and updates from all top newspapers in the world, especially focusing on India.
api_list.code:
